lead_paragraph: Investigators are examining whether other executives failed to report improper behavior by Roger Ailes, the network’s former chairman, people briefed on the inquiry said.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and BEN PROTESS

headline.print_headline: Fox News Harassment Inquiry Is Said to Look at What Others Knew
headline.main: Fox News Sexual Harassment Inquiry Is Said to Look at What Others Knew

snippet: Investigators are examining whether other executives failed to report improper behavior by Roger Ailes, the network’s former chairman, people briefed on the inquiry said....
abstract: Investigators overviewing sexual harassment accusations against former Fox News chairman Roger Ailes are also checking into whether other executives were aware of alleged inappropriate behavior by Ailes and did not act on it; almost 20 women have alleged improper behavior by him.
